retrieve.description: Retrieves macros and their related macroinstructions from an org and writes to a file

parameters.filename: (optional) name of the macro retrieve output file
parameters.targetDir: directory root for the retrieved files
parameters.macroList: list of macros to be retrieved

errors.noMacrosReturned: No macros matching the given names were found in the target org.
errors.writingJson: There was an error writing the results of the retrieval command to '%s'.

deploy.description: Deploys macros and their related macroinstructions to a target org from a file

parameters.fileName: filepath to the macro file to push to the target org

errors.readingJson: There was an error reading the selected file at '%s'. The selected file does not exist or is malformed.
